lead_paragraph: A big question mark hangs over Vincenzo Nibali's form as the 2014 Tour de France champion targets a second Giro d'Italia title when the three-week race starts on Friday.

headline.print_headline: Nibali's Form Under Scrutiny Ahead of Giro Start
headline.main: Nibali's Form Under Scrutiny Ahead of Giro Start

snippet: A big question mark hangs over Vincenzo Nibali's form as the 2014 Tour de France champion targets a second Giro d'Italia title when the three-week race starts on Friday....
